titleStmt.title: An historical vindication of the divine right of tithes from scripture, reason, and the opinion and practice of Jews, Gentiles, and Christians in all ages : designed to supply the omissions, answer the objections, and rectife the mistakes of Mr. Selden's History of tithes / by Tho. Comber ...
titleStmt.author: Comber, Thomas, 1645-1699.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by S. Roycroft, for Robert Clavel ...,
